name: Save the Turtles!
description:
When he comes home to his expecting wife, he thought that nothing can ever change in their peaceful idyllic life. 

Little that they know, that their life as they know it has ended. The lake which was once clean and blue has been polluted, and as far as the eye can see, dead fishes float like a norm and garbage was strewn everywhere across the river. It is now up to the turtle to save the lake from deteriorating further and to fight for the future for his family. 

This is a game to play if you love turtles or just want a short, cute and simple game to enjoy! Let us know if you have any comments about the game!
